data.title: LSU E. J. Ourso College of Business
data.text:
Faculty Areas of Expertise

Work with our faculty to solve a business challenge or engage with our scholars on complex, industry-specific research. Our faculty are world-class researchers who combine current theories and methods with hands-on learning and real-world projects in their courses. They publish articles in top academic journals, write textbooks, and are entrepreneurs, resulting in a well-rounded education from theoretical and real-world perspectives. Contact experienceourso@lsu.edu to be connected with a subject-matter expert.
